top_comments.comment: i tried the thats rad palette on my channel and i had mixed thoughts...love the colors (im a blue and purple girl) but not all of the formulas worked for me

I always wanted to see a blended layered blush look on you and you look phenomenal! Haha I’ve been a subscriber for years and I like when you apply blushes but this look in particular was so nice on you in my opinion.

Emily, I just wanted you to know that I watch all your videos and I also read all your descriptions and I still love your profound and random thought.  Just wanted you to know that I read and appreciate your thoughts! Lots of love from England x😘
Dear Emily, I enjoyed the Charlotte Tilbury so much and know this one will be just as great. Good morning Violetta hope you have a great day, a fellow makeup junkie too.
Omg Covergirl Clean liquid foundation takes me BACK!
